reviewText: Loved the movie! Great subtitles! Course I'm a big Kenichi fan too. The little girl in this is so precious.  I highly recommend his very sweet movie.

Though I didn't cry, there were a couple scenes that got me teary eyed. Great movie and yes I would rather have subs over dubs in my live action movies and anime. I have gotten more an more into watching the Live Action movies after I watch the anime.
